author: emacdonald16
body:
Hello,
I have updated the module StubPtConsistency that used to live in SLHCUpgradeSimulations in CMSSW_6_2_X: (https://github.com/skinnari/cmssw/blob/L1TK_62X_SLHC28/SLHCUpgradeSimulations/L1TrackTrigger/src/StubPtConsistency.cc). It is a track variable that uses the stub bend information to possibly determine quality tracks.
A recent talk on the variable (including definition, implementation, and performance) can be found here: https://indico.cern.ch/event/761293/contributions/3176150/attachments/1734157/2804056/UsingStubBend.pdf
The talk explains the difference between two variables. The variable termed bendchi2, which has the best performance, has been put into the empty StubPtConsistency module, useable by the TTTrack object.
title: L1 trigger - adding stub pT consistency module
